Types

type_validation

Module: type_validation.py

This module provides utility functions for type validation.

The functions in this module check whether a given object is an instance of a specific base class for various ETL components (Extractor, Loader, Step, Context) or, in the case of context objects, a dictionary of valid Context instances.

seroflow.types.type_validation.is_context(context, _raise=False)

Check if the provided object is an instance of the base_context class.

Parameters:

  • context (object) – The object to check.

  • _raise (bool, optional) – If True, raise a TypeError when the check fails. Defaults to False.

Returns:

True if the object is an instance of base_context, otherwise False.

Return type:

bool

Raises:

TypeError – If _raise is True and the object is not an instance of base_context.

seroflow.types.type_validation.is_context_object(context, _raise=False)

Check if the provided object is a valid context object.

A valid context object is defined as a dictionary where each value is an instance of the base_context class.

Parameters:

  • context (object) – The object to check. It should be a dictionary.

  • _raise (bool, optional) – If True, raise a TypeError when the check fails. Defaults to False.

Returns:

True if the object is a dictionary containing only valid base_context instances, otherwise False.

Return type:

bool

Raises:

  • TypeError – If _raise is True and the object is not a dictionary, or if any value in the

  • dictionary is not an instance of base_context. –

seroflow.types.type_validation.is_extractor(extractor, _raise=False)

Check if the provided object is an instance of the base_extractor class.

Parameters:

  • extractor (object) – The object to check.

  • _raise (bool, optional) – If True, raise a TypeError when the check fails. Defaults to False.

Returns:

True if the object is an instance of base_extractor, otherwise False.

Return type:

bool

Raises:

TypeError – If _raise is True and the object is not an instance of base_extractor.

seroflow.types.type_validation.is_loader(loader, _raise=False)

Check if the provided object is an instance of the base_loader class.

Parameters:

  • loader (object) – The object to check.

  • _raise (bool, optional) – If True, raise a TypeError when the check fails. Defaults to False.

Returns:

True if the object is an instance of base_loader, otherwise False.

Return type:

bool

Raises:

TypeError – If _raise is True and the object is not an instance of base_loader.

seroflow.types.type_validation.is_multiextractor(multiextractor, _raise=False)

Check if the provided object is an instance of the base_multiextractor class.

Parameters:

  • multiextractor (object) – The object to check.

  • _raise (bool, optional) – If True, raise a TypeError when the check fails. Defaults to False.

Returns:

seroflow.types.type_validation.is_step(step, _raise=False)

Check if the provided object is an instance of the base_step class.

Parameters:

  • step (object) – The object to check.

  • _raise (bool, optional) – If True, raise a TypeError when the check fails. Defaults to False.

Returns:

Return type:

bool
